Dodge the knife: You fail to dodge the knife and die in pain.`FAILED DODGE ENDING
Scream like a little girl: You scream so loudly that the knife gets deflected. The Great Cuboid is so angry that he explodes.`SCREAMING ENDING

Psychologically bully The Cuboid: The Great Cuboid gets sad and calls in the Cosmic Teacher, who kills you to death.`BULLY ENDING

Be pretend sorry: The Cuboid sees through you. He stomps you into a puddle.`PUDDLE ENDING
Be real sorry: The Cuboid feels better, and you become friends.`FRIEND ENDING

Yell some more again: The Cuboid gets so angry that he expands and expands and turns into a black hole and eats the universe.`ANGERY ENDING
Say sorry: NO U! U DUM! The Cuboid punches you.`OUCH ENDING
Eat him: You eat him. He tastes very good. Then you get indigestion and die.`CONSTIPATION ENDING

Lie down and cry: You get so sad that you commit suicide.`SEVERE DEPRESSION ENDING
Induce amnesia: You give yourself amnesia and forget how to breathe.`LOL UR DUMB ENDING

Eat another pizza: The Cuboid gets so sad that he keels over and dies.`PIZZA-INDUCED DEPRESSION ENDING
Apologize and give the Cuboid your other: Cuboid accepts the pizza and you become best friends.`BFF ENDING

Stick up your middle finger: The Cuboid tries to roar, but then he remembers that he doesn't have a mouth. He flails, and knocks you over and you impale yourself on your middle finger.`DEATH-BY-FINGER ENDING

Run back to The Headless Cuboid: The giants chase you, and discover The Headless Cuboid. They then take turns biting your head off.`ANGERED GIANTS ENDING

Throw a temper tantrum: The giants try to stomp you, but then they realize you have plot armour from being the protaganist of this game.`PLOT ARMOUR ENDING

Ascend to heaven: You ascend to heaven, but God denies you and you die of bubonic plague for no good reason at all.`FAILED HEAVEN ENDING

Fart a silent but deadly: Oops, too deadly. You fart out Chlorine Trifluoride and the Earth explodes in a giant fireball.`LETHAL FART ENDING
